description:
Yamanami Osamu is the Captain of the Kirishima, former flagship of the destroyed 1st fleet. He holds the rank of space colonel, first class. He is from Hyogo prefecture.
He served as post-captain on the Kirishima, the flagship of the 1st fleet commander, Admiral Okita during Operation M. An able warship commander whom Okita trusts implicitly; a principled optimist.
name: Yamanami Osamu
